Metadata.title: QR Platby - Free QR Code Generator for Bank Transfers | PAY by square & EPC QR
Metadata.description: Free QR code generator for bank transfers in PAY by square and EPC (SEPA) formats. Works with all Slovak banks. No registration required.
Metadata.ogDescription: Generate payment QR codes for free. Supports PAY by square and EPC QR formats. Custom colors, logo, and text. All Slovak banks supported.
Metadata.twitterDescription: Free QR code generator for bank transfers. PAY by square & EPC QR for Slovak banks.
Metadata.keywords: QR code, payment, bank transfer, BySquare, PAY by square, EPC QR, SEPA, IBAN, Slovakia, QR code generator, Slovak banks, payment QR code, free, online payment
Metadata.bulkTitle: Bulk QR Code Generation for Payments
Metadata.bulkDescription: Bulk QR code generation for bank transfers from a CSV file. Download as ZIP or PDF.
Metadata.privacyDescription: Information about personal data processing in QR Payments.
Metadata.termsDescription: Terms of use for the QR Payments application.
Metadata.faqDescription: Answers to the most common questions about the QR code payment generator.
Metadata.homeH1: Free QR Code Generator for Bank Payments

ShareLink.title: Share payment via link
ShareLink.description: The link contains IBAN, amount, recipient name, payment symbols, note, and QR code appearance.
ShareLink.logoNotice: The logo won't appear in the shared link. The recipient's QR code will be displayed without it.
